## react-native-material-kit package

react-native-material-kit, the toolkit introducing [Material Design](https://material.io/design/introduction/) to [React Native](https://facebook.github.io/react-native/)<!-- -->.

Author: ywu on 15/6/1.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Button](./react-native-material-kit.button.md) | The <code>Button</code> component. |
|  [Checkbox](./react-native-material-kit.checkbox.md) | The <code>Checkbox</code> component. |
|  [IconToggle](./react-native-material-kit.icontoggle.md) | The <code>IconToggle</code> component.<!-- -->See [MDL implementation](https://getmdl.io/components/index.html#toggles-section/icon-toggle) |
|  [IndeterminateProgress](./react-native-material-kit.indeterminateprogress.md) | Indeterminate linear progress indicator. |
|  [Progress](./react-native-material-kit.progress.md) | Determinate linear progress indicator. |
|  [RadioButton](./react-native-material-kit.radiobutton.md) | The <code>RadioButton</code> component. |
|  [RadioButtonGroup](./react-native-material-kit.radiobuttongroup.md) | Managing a group of radio buttons. |
|  [RangeSlider](./react-native-material-kit.rangeslider.md) | The <code>RangeSlider</code> component. |
|  [Ripple](./react-native-material-kit.ripple.md) | Reusable <code>Ripple</code> effect. |
|  [Slider](./react-native-material-kit.slider.md) | The <code>Slider</code> component. |
|  [Switch](./react-native-material-kit.switch.md) | The <code>Switch</code> component. |
|  [Textfield](./react-native-material-kit.textfield.md) | The <code>Textfield</code> component, which has an optional  and . - TODO styling <code>read-only</code> &amp; <code>disabled</code> mode |
